skill: How to Dab Towards the Left Side

phases.name: starting_position
phases.cue: Keep your knees slightly bent for better balance
phases.pose_hints: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, arms relaxed at your sides
phases.rationale: This position provides a stable base for the movement

phases.name: raise_your_right_arm
phases.cue: Imagine you're pointing to something directly in front of you
phases.pose_hints: Slowly raise your right arm to shoulder height, keeping it straight
phases.rationale: This sets up the opposite arm movement required for the dab

phases.name: drop_your_head_to_the_left
phases.cue: Keep your eyes focused downward to maintain the position
phases.pose_hints: Simultaneously drop your head to the left side, aligning your face with your left armpit
phases.rationale: This is the signature movement of the dab

phases.name: hold_the_position
phases.pose_hints: Hold the dab position for 1-2 seconds, maintaining balance and control
phases.rationale: This allows you to fully execute the move and prepare for the next step

phases.name: return_to_starting_position
phases.cue: Move smoothly to maintain the flow of the dance
phases.pose_hints: Slowly raise your head and lower your right arm back to your side
phases.rationale: This completes the dab movement and prepares you for repetition or the next dance move

constraints.workspace_hint: short to medium range combat movements
